price: 59. Y que no piensen quienes rechazan la verdad que pueden esquivar Nuestro castigo, pues nunca podrán escapar de él.
arabic: وَلَا يَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَبَقُوٓاْۚ إِنَّهُمۡ لَا يُعۡجِزُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: walā yaḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū sabaqū innahum lā yuʿ'jizūna
